Package de.fu.scetris.ipc Description

Provides a framework for transparently using a Client-/Server-Architecture-like RPC-API.

The idea is, since we use XmlAttribute for annotating getter-methods which are serializable in a certain way to use the same information for serializing objects to XML, send them over the wirde and reconstruct them on the other side.

This package also contains implementations such as ThreadedHandler, which is intended to be run on a Server and handle Requests each in their own Thread.

Since:
Iteration3
